TopicTitle: A Kerbal's Guide to the Galaxy

Articles.Content:
Mainly just some artwork, but info too.

Starmap:

Maps of the main systems with planets:

I will be adding all these stars (using StarSystems) and their planets to Planet Factory Revived as soon as Kopernicus is fixed.

Kerbol: The only star in stock KSP.

Come on, you should know these! I'm not even listing them.

Blacky Karman: A black hole at the center of the Galaxy.

Octavia: An orange dwarf much like Kerbol but with only a ringed sub-brown dwarf orbiting it.

Apollo: A beautiful warm sub-brown dwarf with a system of rings.

Dolas: A small white dwarf with a system of planets and lots of comets.

Inaccessable: A spinning potato-shaped dwarf planet, very hard to land on.

Ascension: A comet with an incredibly eccentric and inclined orbit.

Sentar: A blue ringed gas giant with a few moons.

Urania: A blue gas giant with a faint ring, storms, and a ridiculous amount of moons.

Librar: A rocky "Super-Kerbin" orbiting near Urania with a few moons.

Nim: A dim brown dwarf near Kerbol.

Corbo: A red giant with exotic planets and a debris disk further from it.

Ablate: A melting rocky dwarf planet with oddly high density.

Kaiser: A colorful gas giant with large moons.

Fearless: A rocky Kerbin-sized world with very small moons.

Boris: A purple, Eve-sized ice world with a thin oxygen atmosphere.

Wot: A colorful gas giant with giant storms dotting it's surface.

Putto: A large dwarf planet.

Oorma: A dwarf planet much like Putto.

Arane: A red dwarf planet with many craters.

Flo: An irregularly shaped icy dwarf planet.

Vendela: A cyan star twice the mass of Kerbol.

Oblok: A blue-white star emitting tons of UV radiation.

Genoya: A dying orange giant.

Sine Cluster

Alternis: An orange star much like Kerbol, but significantly dimmer.

Xubol: A molten-hot planet much like Moho.

Egar: A red planet with a toxic atmosphere.

Meander: A blue gas planet with many storms and unique moons.

Sothebin: A huge "Super-Kerbin" with dry moons.

Ralph: A large, Kerbin-sized ice planet.

Faz: A tiny comet with a highly inclined orbit.

Jall: A fat comet with dangerous terrain.

Krepa: A dying red giant that may have once been much to Kerbol that has now swallowed up all it's planets.

New Kerbol: A red dwarf with a stable, habitable planetary system.

Mop: A melting rocky planet, blasted with radiation.

Voon: A warm orange gas giant similar to Jool.

Evon: A planet slightly larger than Duna with hydrocarbon lakes and a thick atmosphere.

Etaria: A semi-habitable planet, colder than Kerbin.

Bloor: A mostly icy world, with red flatlands.

Smock: An ice planet far from New Kerbol.

Nepdor: A warm yellow star slightly larger than our own.

Pikerin: A tiny red dwarf seriously lacking in metals and barely able to fuse hydrogen.

Opete: An orange subgiant.

Centra: A green gas giant with highly inclined rings and moons.

Edited December 19, 2014 by _Augustus_

Kerbol system:

Moho: A brown rocky planet close to Kerbol.

Eve: A big purple planet with toxic seas Has 1 moon.

Kerbin: A habitable world where the kerbals live and home to the KSC, has 2 moons.

Duna: A rocky red planet with polar ice caps Has 1 moon.

Dres: A small dwarf planet.

Jool: A big green gas giant with some moons.

Sarnus: A gas giant with rings and moons.

Urlum: A blue ice giant with moons and rings.

Neidon: An ice giant with some moons.

Plock & Karen: Two binary planets at the edge of the solar system.

Planet X: A big gas giant with a highly elliptical orbit.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Nepdor System:
 

Harvest: A small yellow asteroid.

Valit: A red dwarf planet.

Sarvin: A blue gas giant with rings and moons.

Keelon: A giant rocky planet with moons.

Daphne: A purple gas giant with rings and a lot of moons.

Pergas: An icy dwarf planet.

Yabi: An icy gas giant with no moons.

Ganag: A icy dwarf planet at the edge of the solar system.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Pikerin System:

Skylah: A small dwarf planet.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Krepa System:

Bolca: A rocky planet orbiting very close to Krepa, has a particle trail.

Vibar: A gas giant with rings and moons that has not yet been swallowed up, has 1 habitable moon.

Sabole: A cold dwarf planet orbiting far from Krepa, has faint dust rings and 1 very small moon.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Oblok System:

Eskor: An evaporating planet that make up most of Dranos, has a particle trail.

Dranos: It is made from the evaporating planet Eskor and has rings.

Tamio: A gas giant with rings.

Gedo: A beautiful gas giant with rings and 1 habitiable moon.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Don't even bother coming here: A small asteroid that is very close to Blacky Karman and spins a bit faster than inaccessible, it is very and i mean VERY difficult to go here, if you can land on here and plant a flag on it then congrats you’re a ksp god!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Ginger & Fred: 2 binary stars that are the same size and colour as Kerbol.

Ginger & Fred system:

Barney: A small yellow dwarf planet about the size of tylo, has 1 moon.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Stella: A star like ours.

Stella system:

Plantar: A metal planet with 1 moon.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Serious: A star like ours.

Serious system:

Joker: A colourful asteroid.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Osiris: A neutron star spinning very fast.

Osiris system:

Giba: A brown terrestrial planet orbiting Osiris.

Uda: A blue ice giant with rings and moons.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Mia, Mal, and Mca: 3 stars part of a trinary system, they are a bit larger than Kerbol.

Mia, Mal, and Mca system:

Xiba: A gas giant orbiting the barycentre.

Quesi: A rocky planet orbting Mia.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Yiba, Xcbi, Wko, and Vza: 4 stars in a Quaternary star system, they are red dwarfs and orbit close to each other.

Dola: A rocky planet orbiting Vza, has 1 moon.

Sabo: A gas giant with faint rings and a few moons.

Jigo: A purple ice giant similar to Neidon, has faint rings and a couple of moons.

Edited October 7, 2016 by saturnsrings
